short_description: SET THE NAME OF ONE OR MORE MAPS IN A FILE
help_text: Sets the name of one or more maps for metric, shape, label, volume, cifti scalar or cifti label files.  You must specify either -name-file, or -from-data-file, or at least one -map option.  The three option types are mutually exclusive.

params.description: the file to set the map names of

options.description: use a text file to replace all map names

params.description: text file containing map names, one per line

options.description: use the map names from another data file

params.description: a data file with the same number of maps

repeatable_options.description: specify a map to set the name of

params.description: the map index to change the name of
the name to set for the map
